bibl.title: Terracottas from Ismant el-Kharab.
bibl.note: 51 fragments from Ptolemaic and Roman terracotta figurines.

bibl.title: Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons

bibl.seg: STEVENS Anna, Terracottas from Ismant el-Kharab.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 277-295, 1 tabl., 22 figg.
51 fragments from Ptolemaic and Roman terracotta figurines.
